<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_542049_ideas_maxi_prep_with_confirmation</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Rule 1</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	gs.info('current state=' + current.state);
	if (current.state == 1) {
		var plasmidPrepTask = new GlideRecord('x_542049_ideas_plasmid_preps_task');
		plasmidPrepTask.initialize();
		plasmidPrepTask.tube_type = current.tube_type;
		plasmidPrepTask.pickup_loc = current.pickup_location;
		plasmidPrepTask.request_comment = current.request_comment;
		plasmidPrepTask.construct_name = current.construct_name;
		plasmidPrepTask.size = current.size;
		plasmidPrepTask.copy_number = current.copy_number;
		plasmidPrepTask.bacterial_selection = current.bacterial_selection;
		plasmidPrepTask.bacterial_host = current.bacterial_host;
		plasmidPrepTask.growth_medium = current.growth_medium;
		plasmidPrepTask.user = current.user;
		plasmidPrepTask.parent = current.sys_id;
		plasmidPrepTask.insert();
		current.state = -3;
	}
	gs.info('Exiting rule 1');
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-15 16:00:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>abaf046a2f812c10dab390bcf699b670</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Rule 1</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IDEAS" source="x_542049_ideas">e520e4ba2f88a810749af64ef699b609</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IDEAS">e520e4ba2f88a810749af64ef699b609</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_abaf046a2f812c10dab390bcf699b670</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-16 19:06:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=abaf046a2f812c10dab390bcf699b670"/></record_update>
